name: Game of the goose HD
description:
The classic Game of the Goose now in your ipad!

*** NEWS!
Now the Goose has its own store. Play games and win Beakdollars, the Goose's official currency. You'll get new dice packs and boards with them.

Enjoy the Autumn board with the "crazy dice" or cross the Solar System on the Space Board while you throw the "Alien dice".

With this version you have the Autumn board totally free!
***

Board game for 1-4 players for all ages

The Game of the Goose is a game in which you must reach the last field before your opponents. Many fields have special effects for players who land on them.

This is an ideal game for younger children. They can play among them or with their seniors, being the perfect game to carry with you wherever you go, or simply play at home.

Main features:

· 3D dice with real physics.

· Designed with iPad in mind. The board has been drawn from zero to adpat it to the iPad's screen. You'll have the information facing you in every moment, no matter where are you placed on the board.

· Custom dice, different boards, sliding pieces, funny effects and hour of enjoy in this classic game.
